meta.title: Project Symbiosis
meta.description: The purpose of this project is to examine intelligent things and the living together of unlike beings.

d:toDo.d:toDo: Don't require groups to be consistent.
Define live and show that reproduction is not relevant by countering with an fictional story.
Show that consent is important, because of liability.

chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.paragraph:
The purpose of this project is to examine intelligent things and
the living together of unlike organisms https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Symbiosis
. Symbiosis seems to be the brains' most important objective, caused by the fact that living beings don't seem to be able to live alone in practice, and live's most unique property is being intelligent.
